column1: Uchi////We ordered the Kara Kyuri (phenomenal cold sake drink with cucumber and Thai chili)
column10: and the fried milk dessert. Everything was excellent
column11: fresh and flavorful with the exception of one dish- the bacon tataki. For pork belly
column12: it was very tough and chewy
column13: our entire table agreed and we sent it back. The chef remade it and the second order came out much more tender
column14: but still not my favorite dish. I would not order it again.
